b: when touches hand then play button click
when touches hand then play enter digital beep
when touches hand then become next in 0.2s
when touches hand then tell screen-toggle
when touches hand and is screen_state = 0 then play droid blips 11 with low-pitch 30
when touches hand and is screen_state = 1 then play droid blips 6 with low-pitch 30
when touches hand and is screen_state = 1 then is screen_state = 0
when touches hand and is screen_state = 0 then is screen_state = 1
when starts then become next in 2.4s
when starts then become next in 0.2s
